document.full_text: explosives hidden in a plastic bag were detonated at the wedding of a policeman about 40 miles south of baghdad on wednesday, killing 7 people and wounding 15.
document.title: middle east: iraq: blast at policeman's wedding kills 7
lines_and_colors: explosives hidden in a plastic bag were detonated at the wedding of a policeman about 40 miles south of baghdad on wednesday, killing 7 people and wounding 15.
